channel.title: [Outdated] Bodyguards were bypassed
channel.description: ####What happened? as a neutral king my job was to survive the game. during the 6th night I attempted to use my last bodyguard only for it to fail. there was no explanation that the attacker was able to bypass my guards using night immunity. ####Comments: as malchior recommended I'm bringing up this issue. while I understand there are classes that are able to bypass night immunity having the game tell the player what happened example "someone bypassed your guards/immunity/whatever" this will make it easy for beginners and those not class savvy just yet. I could also advise this same system be put in for death by poison, possession, reaped whatever. (This cause of death would only be displayed for the player killed)

item.title: [Outdated] Bodyguards were bypassed
item.dc:creator: Malchior
item.description:
We actually believe it was a Sellsword that caused this to occur in kitsune’s game.

Nonetheless, I think it would be nice for the game to give a text notification when you have night immunity of some kind.

“A killer bypassed your night immunity” appearing in chat. Still giving no details as to what or how the immunity was bypassed, thus not giving out free information in games without a physician.
